name: FRIEM AMERICA
description: Manufacturer of high electrical rectifier power supply units.
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying for Inflation Reduction Act support at the Departments of Commerce and Energy. Supporting client in strengthening the Green Hydrogen Energy supply chain and to increase U.S. jobs.
